Value.Text: A wandering blacksmith has found her way into town, apparently guided by one of the adventurers that left a while back. She set up shop in one of the houses, and you can buy weapons and armour from her.
The discovery of a site for mining iron has allowed to blacksmith to forge new equipment.
The discovery of a site for mining coal has allowed to blacksmith to smelt steel and forge new equipment.
The discovery of a site for mining starion has allowed to blacksmith to forge new equipment.
The discovery of a site for mining ferrusite has allowed to blacksmith to forge new equipment.
The discovery of a site for mining silverium has allowed to blacksmith to forge new equipment.
A group of mages and their apprentices have arrived in the village, and set up a small magic school. The apprentices can head out on adventures to gain experience if they desire.
A group of soldiers and their squires have arrived in the village, and set up a small training camp. The soldiers can head out on adventures to gain experience and funds if they desire.
A group of hunters and their trainees have arrived in the village, and set up a small archery range. The hunters can head out on hunts to gain experience if they desire.
A merchant arrived in town, reporting his survival to be thanks to an adventurer from the village. He's agreed to set up a trade route with the town, increasing our funds.
Some of the captured villagers stumble back into town, telling stories of the mighty adventurer who saved them from the goblin clutches.
